title: [服务器][PC/PE]梦回旧景Dbackolds

txt_content:

中国服Dbackolds服务器来了，从原来的MCPC监狱风云服到现在PENK服，一路上我们**了非常的多！服务器开创以来2017-2019年3年时间我们换过2个群死服几十次但是我们还是坚持了过来。我们欢迎大家的加入！为什么要赞助？光是腐竹一个人来续费服务器是不可能的，经费不足随时会停运！我们的官网：mcbaiy.ftcraft.top 欢迎大家的到来！

Chinese service Dbackolds server came, from the original MCPC prison Fengyun service to the present PENK service, along the way we have a lot of managers! In the three years since the server was founded, we have changed two groups of dead clothes dozens of times in the three years from 2017 to 2019, but we still insisted on it. We welcome you all to join us! Why sponsor? It is impossible for yuba to renew the server alone. If the funds are insufficient, it will be out of service at any time! Our official website: mcbaiy. Ftcraft. Top, welcome everyone!
